# UniDocs Project - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
UniDocs is a full-stack document management system for university students and pedagogues at FTI (Faculty of Information Technology).

## Tech Stack
- **Backend**: Node.js, Express.js, TypeScript, PostgreSQL
- **Frontend**: React, TypeScript, TailwindCSS
- **PDF Generation**: PDFKit
- **Authentication**: JWT
- **Validation**: Zod

## Project Structure
- `/backend` - Express API server
- `/frontend` - React application
- `/shared` - Shared TypeScript types and utilities

## Progress Checklist
- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md file
- [x] Scaffold the Project
- [x] Install dependencies
- [x] Configure environment files
- [x] Setup Docker with PostgreSQL and MinIO
- [x] Start services and test the application

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript strict mode
- Follow RESTful API conventions
- Validate all inputs with Zod
- Use proper error handling
- Add JSDoc comments for complex functions
- Keep components small and focused
